channel.title: Wanted testers for new pay script also Auth help
channel.description:
Hey guys i have been working on a new pay script an i need other people to test it an tell me what bugs you may find. Please note that i want ONLY trusted memebers who hav been here a while. you must also be able to test it quite a bit. The script is a Al-Kharid smelter,cannonball maker it can also use ring of forging(cannonball making an using forging ring still need a little bit of work thought... that why i need testers so they can tell me whats wrong with the script.
i need about 2-3 testers so been in quick i will pick the first people who replay (as long as you are trusted of corse).
Also i need someone that can help me with adding genos auth system to my script as i have no idea how :confused: if you could give me step by step instrustion i would be very very very happy.
thanks for reading this

item.title: Wanted testers for new pay script also Auth help
item.dc:creator: @Doodie Doodie
item.description:
@Doodie wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:10, topic:46343”][quote author=Arr0w link=topic=64518.msg768321#msg768321 date=1168733729]
Just so you know Doodie joined in december.
[/quote]
That means nothing. I joined September, but my scar cheating history goes way back, to December 2005/January 2006.[/quote] Same, and whos not to say I even make my own Scripts nor look around fourms before I sign up?

Read full topic
